scripts.build:win: pnpm build:renderer && cd packages/main && uv run nuitka --onefile --output-dir=../../dist --windows-console-mode=attach --include-data-dir=../renderer/dist=renderer_dist --windows-icon-from-ico=../renderer/public/favicon.ico --assume-yes-for-downloads main.py
scripts.build:mac: pnpm build:renderer && cd packages/main && uv run nuitka --macos-create-app-bundle --output-dir=../../dist --include-data-dir=../renderer/dist=renderer_dist --macos-app-icon=../renderer/public/favicon.ico --assume-yes-for-downloads main.py
